body_html:
Hello Maud, thanks for reporting this! I could reproduce it locally the other day. It would seem that the current season is fetched from the DB way too often (n+1 problem?). Haven't had the time to dig deeper – if anyone wants to tackle this: it's up for grabs 😄

It's a performance issue, but not a really pressing one. I don't have any data too back this, but I should think that GET /users is not our most frequented endpoint.

body:
Hello Maud, thanks for reporting this! I could reproduce it locally the other day. It would seem that the current season is fetched from the DB way too often (n+1 problem?). Haven't had the time to dig deeper – if anyone wants to tackle this: it's up for grabs 😄 

It's a performance issue, but not a really pressing one. I don't have any data too back this, but I should think that `GET /users` is not our most frequented endpoint.
